svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Average hours of work per week, by industry, United States
Average hours of work per week spent in manufacturing, railroad, bituminous coal, and anthracite coal industries
according to Jones' historical estimates. See the source tab for more details.
